analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa hetuka duka ādi sa ni dassana ttika

original: Nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na ahetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā saṅkhitta hetuyā
tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Nasahetukanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa hetuka na a nidassana sa paṭigha mūle pi tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: (Nahetusampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ sahetukadukasadisaṁ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam na sanidassana sappaṭigham sa hetuka duka sadisa tīṇi pañhā hetu sahetuka duke ca hetu hetu sampayutta duke ca pañhā no labbhati
